name: admin.users.setRegular
desc: Set an existing guest user, admin user, or owner to be a regular user.

user_id.desc: The ID of the user to designate as a regular user.

errors.cannot_set_this_guest_to_regular_at_team: This guest cannot be set to regular because they are active on multiple workspaces.
errors.cannot_modify_primary_owner: The primary owner cannot be modified.
errors.failed_to_set_user_to_regular: Changing a user to a regular member failed.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.not_an_admin: This method can only be accessed by org owners and admins.
errors.user_not_found: The requested user was not found.
